descriptionlist.description:
This package does nothing and can be safely uninstalled.
To maximize enabled features, please install the correct release for your OS. Do not attempt to install two MobileMiniBrowser versions at the same time.
CyberKit Fennec allows you to test CyberKit using Firefox for iOS.

changelog.change: Updated WebKit from 7616.1.7 branch to 7616.1.12 branch
Bundle internationalization instead of using potentially older system data, and other iOS 12 work
